short_summary: Modernization and upgrading of electrical networks - Sorel Base
description: The project involves modifying the existing gatehouse building in order to separate the electrical systems from the other installations and build a fully independent electrical room. It will include architectural, structural, mechanical and electrical work.
full_summary:
**Bid Solicitation for Modernization and Upgrading of Electrical Networks - Sorel Base**
=====================================

**Bid Solicitation Number**: WS4241834024
**Date of Publication**: February 9, 2024
**Closing Date**: April 9, 2024, at 2:00 p.m.

**Project Description**:
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, invites bids to modernize and upgrade the electrical networks at the Sorel Base. The project involves modifying the existing gatehouse building to separate the electrical systems from other installations and construct a fully independent electrical room. The scope of work includes architectural, structural, mechanical, and electrical services.

**Bid Requirements**:
Tenders must be submitted in accordance with the bid solicitation documents, which can be accessed through the authoritative source listed below.

**Contracting Entity**:
Public Works and Government Services Canada
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
Canada

**Contact Information**:
Jennifer Kirouac (SPAC/PSPC)
jennifer.kirouac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Trade Agreements**:
This bid solicitation is open to suppliers who are compliant with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Notice**: 
This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes a previous bid solicitation with the same number, dated October 5, 2023, with a closing of November 7, 2023, at 2:00 p.m.

**Bid Solicitation Document**: The bid solicitation document can be accessed at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18761052?extsite=MTg3NjEwNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that this contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.
